All functions

avg_evol_dist()
Calculate average evolutionary distinctiveness across multiple time scales

Build Trait Data from the LEDA Traitbase
calc_range_size()
Calculate range sizes for multiple species
check_EER_status_k()
Check Eco-Evolutionary Rarity (EER) Status with K Parameter
check_biomes()
Analyze Species Convex Hulls Against Biome Data
check_continents()
Check Range Intersections with Continent Polygons
clip_polygons_to_land()
Clip species range polygons to land boundaries
compute_wcss()
Compute Within-Cluster Sum of Squares (WCSS) Compute the Within-Cluster Sum of Squares (WCSS) for a given variable and a range of cluster values (k) using k-means clustering.
define_custom_k_ranges()
Define Custom K Ranges
elbow_plot()
Display Elbow Plot
fun_dist()
Calculate relative functional distinctiveness for species based on trait data
get_continent_sf()
Get continent spatial data from a GeoJSON file

Get Phylogeny of Angiosperms

Get Convex Hull Polygons for Species from GBIF Data

Plot clipped convex hulls on map

Plot convex hulls on map
